name: Separate URL & Query String
description:
Matches URL (hostname + URI) as group 1, query string as group 2. Good for removing query string from Google Analytics.

To get #anchors as group 3 use ([^\?]+)([^#]+)?(#)?
content:
http://www.website.com/
http://www.website.com/directory/
http://www.website.com/directory/file.filename
http://www.website.com/?querystring
http://www.website.com/?key=val
http://www.website.com/directory/?key=val
http://www.website.com/?key=val#anchor
author: jamiegoodwin.uk
